entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
